title: Gifting a PROJECT Skin during First Strike?
body: Will gifting a PROJECT Skin during First Strike unlock the PROJECT border for the person you're gifting, or just the skin? I'm assuming it would, but I just want to make sure.

replies.body:
Hey Nexustect! 

If you gift someone a PROJECT: skin (Yasuo not included), the person receiving the gift will receive the First Strike border, as long as the gift was sent between September 8th - September 15th.
Will the PROJECT skins be available in a bundle?

They don't announce sales early :p You'll have to wait to see!

"Any information on if there will be a bundle or not will be announced on September 8th when these skins are released.

Skins will be full price during the first week of release (9/8 - 9/15). If you purchase these skins during this time, you'll receive the limited edition loading screen card. The second week (beginning 9/17), all 1350 RP skins will be reduced to 975 RP. If you purchase these skins during the second week, you will not receive the loading screen card."

-Riot KateyKhaos [(SOURCE)](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/oOdkgAVb-riot-question-about-project-skins?comment=0002)
